original_text: Do not join with people who are eating a feast because they are happy. Do not go into their house to eat and drink with them.
korean_text: 너는 잔칫집에 들어가서 그들과 함께 앉아 먹거나 마시지 말라

sentences.original_text: Do not join with people who are eating a feast
sentences.korean_translation: 잔치를 먹고 있는 사람들과 함께하지 마라

sentences.original_text: Do not go into their house
to eat and drink with them
